61  |  WorkforceAnnual Employee Survey 
Each fall, we ask our employees to complete an annual survey. It is our most-used 
channel for receiving feedback, and the responses are critical for helping us understand 
employees and implement change. In 2021, we achieved an 85% participation rate from 
nonunion employees and a 47% participation rate from union employees.
